sections.heading: or tenant of lot; solicit or accept compensation from tower; prohibited
sections.text: Any owner or tenant causing the towing away of a vehicle shall not solicit or accept therefor a commission, gift, gratuity, or any form of compensation or wealth from the person or business towing away the vehicle.SourceLaws 197

60-2411.Owner or tenant of lot; solicit or accept compensation from tower; prohibited.

Any owner or tenant causing the towing away of a vehicle shall not solicit or accept therefor a commission, gift, gratuity, or any form of compensation or wealth from the person or business towing away the vehicle.

SourceLaws 1979, LB 348, ยง 11;Laws 2010, LB1065, ยง 11.
